Text: You my friend, ARE A GOD, thanks for all the uploads!!!!!!!!

Bad sound!  The audio is very, very slightly desynchronized.  For a 10Gig file, it really is unfortunate.

Also, I don't know if it's my ears or what, but I find that the audiovision track is much fuller.  I found myself listening to it instead of the regular audio track (mainly because of the desynchronization) and I found that the audiovision track was much louder, more dynamic, and fuller.  It might have just been my TV since I don't have a full home cinema system (just a HD TV).  But it really sounded louder, especially when changing from regular to audiovision, the change is quite noticeable.

Overall, not good enough for me to keep the movie.
Strange. This is the first SBS mkv that doesn't play on my Tvix media player. The picture stays black while the audio plays. Too bad. Thanks anyway.
